title: Can I use my NA Account for PBE?
body: I've been trying to make an account for PBE. Tried watching  some videos in Youtube on how to make one but I can't seem to get it. They said I must go to this link: https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe and log in but I can't find the server selection on the upper right part of the page. Can anyone help me fix this problem? Thanks in advance.

replies.body: Me too i was trying for 3 moths, i don t know what do anymore, iwathced like 20 videos about how to sign up for pbe account but when i get to that sign up page i saids(something gone wrong, maintenace golems are working on a problem-or something like that). Can anyone give me just a clue or something i am lost, please help me somewone i want to join in pbe soo bad.

As *Heavy Machinery* mentioned, you'll need to sign up for access using the link you mentioned in your post. You don't need to change the region since the link unless your account isn't on NA, so you should be fine to signup there. Check out our [PBE FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ#top) for more details on how the system works.

Let me know if you have any questions.

You dont use your NA account on the PBE, you create a new one using the form on that webpage you linked in your post. Then if you're selected you will get a download link to the PBE client and you use your newly created account to log in

A PBE account (last time I checked) is automatically level 30 and has huge amounts of IP and RP so you dont have to worry about grinding to unlock things or anything like that
